name: yaml-task-runner
description: Run specific tasks when hovering over them with specific tools and flags. It picks up the name of the task and complete the rest based on the configuration.

yaml-task-runner.tool.description: Tool to be used when running the task. eg. 'docker', 'docker-compose', 'kubectl', 'helm', 'kustomize', 'terraform', etc.

yaml-task-runner.mainFlag.description: Add the task name in a flag. Leave empty if you want to run the task directly. eg. docker run -name '<task-name>'

yaml-task-runner.additionalFlags.description: Additional Flags to be added. eg. docker run -name '<task-name>' -rm -interactive
